nodes.title: Inoculation Theory: Creating resistance against persuasion, and how Coinbase used it to evade public flak
nodes.excerpt: Two days back,  Coinbase , a cryptocurrency exchange platform, posted an  article  on their blog, titled,  "An upcoming story about Coinbase…
nodes.description: Coinbase recently did something unconventional. Although the internet is split about it, I decided to write about why they did so, and why it might have worked out.

nodes.title: Hackathons, the ice cream trucks of the tech industry.
nodes.excerpt: We had 8 crushed cans of Red Bulls, 4 packets of half-eaten chips, two pairs of drowsy red eyes and 8 hours left. I hadn’t slept in days and…
